Public Types

enum  TimeContext { timeContextNameSample = 0, timeContextNameSecond = 1 }
 

TimeContext are used in cases where we need to specify if values/presentation is by sample or seconds.

More...
enum  ParameterContext { parameterContextNameNone = 0, parameterContextNameFrequency = 1, parameterContextNamePeriod = 2, parameterContextNameTrigger = 3 }
 

Some parameters can have a context to determine how a value is interpreted.
